name: Testing! Testing! BloodLust
description: Was it the butler? The author? Or maybe the detective himself! You can't even trust your closest friends in this thrilling story that you have control over! This is the testing sandbox build of a murder mystery game in development by the title BloodLust (or formally know as Murder Manor). There isn't much to do in the current build but it should get updated soon. It would be highly appreciated if you donated! We don't have any money towards this project right now!
